answers.answer: My doc told me it depends on the person you can eat completely healthy food and still get it. My little  man makes me crave sweets to the point I used to eat a bag of Milano cookies a night and a Hershey's candy bar with almonds every day and I don't have it but everyone is different :)
I wouldn't worry. I crave nothing but sweets with my son, an I usually eat a lot of them during the day. I took my test and turned out fine.
I am probably one of the most unhealthy eaters there is out there.. my results were negative and diabetes does run in my family. Good luck hun
oh wow,yeah thats wat happens to me a lot too but no candy just slurpies and soda and grapes pears, and i drink a lot of water but im just scare

Thank you ShellyLette i pray every morning and every night and hoping everything turns out negative for diabetes, like i said im 25 weeks and i gained 14 pounds in 1 month and a half im just putting weight!
tabbykatt ever since i found out i was pregnant i controlled my sweets but all of the sudden i started craving more sweets and i try to stop but sometimes i cant resits!

Oh there's no stopping me. Im lucky if I even eat real food at all during the day. it didn't help in my first trimester that real food made me throw up so I ate a lot of junk food. and now that I'm in my third trimester it's kinda coming back.
I am 35 weeks and I crave soda like crazy!! I don't have digestive diabetes either! I try to avoid soda but I can resist!!
I'm the same as Shelly. Me and healthy food are not meant for each other lol I love junk sugary foods. Diabetes also runs in my family, and my results were also negative!

question: So i am 25 weeks pregnant. On may 10th im goin to be tested for diabetes, diabetes doesnt run in my family but my little girl is making me crave little bit of sweets including soda. I try to drink lots and lots of water but im still nervous im gonna test positive. Does any body feel worried?! or had diabetes while pregnant? Any feedback?! Thanks
title: A bit nervous!
